data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3Yf617GZrJIQ7kNvgFLfEGn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDWOvaMsbIOOSEW0Y-Vd8tSakUvFpSqR_iEF3fyXj9stg&oe=66965A1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2p2lvxmO63EQ7kNvgEA7J5D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBVB0nNBOrFY2v1O2INm9b1D9MBXQFGRoz07DtGgB1LKw&oe=669663A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2sFZBLAGnd4Q7kNvgHn_WlC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAivRRZGj2rO2RvVEKQZ7jxoPS_Cym2abh4frfe7jGW-g&oe=66964B07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=A9K78xOYSrEQ7kNvgGL65On&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAu4bRGNLpcMuVW3y1okZ0VveKBDvY-0dLTrBd1uZJOGA&oe=66963DE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0S-5YW_ZAm4Q7kNvgH3uiZz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBxv8cOFHI3GvFQcBBs9_4wN_QtXj_72fau8bc0-JgoBw&oe=66966A58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=c6_yNqRhUowQ7kNvgGjlnnE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAt1cXPTUAHMUui-5mr7Fqr_F45enC2rurcnoQpO-IYdA&oe=669666D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gzwcuWnkUPgQ7kNvgFqFF6m&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDdKrog88u471mwHToxwc98NKg4I3KDjBrCsQniQzSxdg&oe=66964CF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NZ6inZ86FfcQ7kNvgGOo39t&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAa7AukdEkwov6gY4Bxx6OObW-gEFnOwJwL7IPPeSJNNA&oe=6696376A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m-W-qIJ-DgkQ7kNvgGWZuEJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAd73-pwz07ydoRY5SDSYycp-INs8ct_HRAkWW8rK-odg&oe=66964B17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sVnslAjJ7dcQ7kNvgGBYQ0E&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD0VJKfnED5RyIUnPYBlb5vibr8ftG1xgDeAKr31Xvj2g&oe=6696668C)
